BackstoryDef.title: Evolved Humanoid Child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a common family on a world with a huge focus on genetic manipulation and engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] has many generations of genetic engineering that had been inherited from previous generations preparing them for life on the rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Evolved Humanoid Indigent
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was born into a poor family on a world with a huge focus on genetic manipulation and engineering. [PAWN_pronoun] has many generations of genetic engineering that had been inherited from previous generations preparing them for revenge on the rim.

BackstoryDef.title: Evolved Humanoid Colonist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was conscripted into the exploration core on their homeworld to boldy explore worlds on the rim. [PAWN_pronoun] has explored several hostile rimworlds and is somehow miraculously still alive.

BackstoryDef.title: Evolved Humanoid Militia
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was exiled into slave ship existence from their homeworld to supply slave labor to worlds on the rim. [PAWN_pronoun] was enslaved to several hostile factions across the rim and is somehow miraculously still alive. [PAWN_pronoun] has now joined the Militia's resistance to seek revenge.
